lyrics.stanza: Jesus Himself drew near, And joined them as they walked, And soon their hearts began to burn, As of Himself He talked: Draw near, O Lord.
Jesus Himself drew near, They were no longer sad; When He was walking at their side, How could they but be glad? Draw near, O Lord.
Jesus Himself drew near, And all their doubts were solved; He showed them why Christ came to die, And what that death involved: Draw near, O Lord.
Jesus Himself drew near, And at the journey's end They could not let Him leave them thus, The Stranger was their Friend: Draw near, O Lord.
